channel.title: Tls on www
channel.description: Recent content in Tls on www

item.title: Let's Encrypt - Free SSL/TLS Certificates
item.description: Just type: www -s your-domain.tld If want to serve content from an specific directory: www -s your-domain.tld -r /tmp That’s it :-). Requirements You need a valid domain/subdomain pointing to a valid public IP, also port 443 needs to be open. Your DNS record may look like this: your-domain.tld IN A X.X.X.X In where X.X.X.X is your public IP
